name: VR Horror Stories
summary: Horror movies and horror stories have long fascinated people. "VR Horror Stories" is a passive horror game experience that places viewers in dark haunted environments where a terrifying monster, zombie, ghost, or demon lurks around you. This thrilling journey features 20 short 360° horror videos, totaling 55 minutes, each enhanced with spatial audio to help you locate surrounding threats before they close in on you. Experience a mix of atmospheric scares and narrative-driven stories, with multilingual...
